name: capture
description: Runs when a piece is captured.

name: check
description: Runs when the king is in check.

name: checkmate
description: Runs when the king is checkmated.

name: enPassant
description: Runs when en passant is occured.

name: move
description: Runs when a move is played.

name: promote
description: Runs when a pawn is promoted.

name: start
description: Runs when a chess game has started.

name: undo
description: Runs when a move is undo.
